Units move twice as fast on Ocean terrain. Use this option to reduce unit travel times over Oceans.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]This option will double the movement of all embarked units and naval units. Coast terrain has doubled movement cost to compensate. Units effectively move twice as fast only on Ocean terrain.

No free envoys from being the first player to meet a City-State[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]On Earth maps with predictable City-States, the free CS envoy can be considered an unfair advantage. Use this option for game balance.

No shared visibility for joining an emergency.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]You may want to reveal a Natural Wonder for the recon unit experience or Era Score boost at the right time. Use this option to prevent emergencies from revealing Natural Wonders.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires Rise and Fall or Gathering Storm

Raise the Era Score threshold for Dark Ages and Golden Ages[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Normal Games: Raises the Era Score thresholds to 18 and 28, with a (+) or (-) 8 change for a past Golden Age or Dark Age.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Dramatic Ages: Raises the threshold to 35, with a -15 change for a past Dark Age[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]On Earth maps with the maximum number of players and Natural Wonders, Era Score can be gained too easily. Use this option for game balance.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires Rise and Fall or Gathering Storm
